text: Bulbine caput-medusae is a species of plant in the Asphodelaceae family. It is endemic to Namibia. Its natural habitats are dry savanna and hot deserts. ==References== * Loots, S. & Craven, P. 2004. Bulbine caput-medusae. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. title: Bulbine caput-medusae
